title: [Launcher Newest patch] Avast blocked it and i cant play anymore
body:
So i tried to launch my league client and avast flagged it as an infection and i think blocked it. so i just have to unblock it right? and it'll work cause right now as is if i try to launch it normally or admin it wont even bring up the screen.

help plz

replies.body: Same issue. Except I know without a doubt I told Avast NOT to block it. I can look into Avast and I see that I have various League of Legends exceptions already, I honestly wouldn't know what to add to the list. I've tried deleting the launcher folder, which has worked for me in the past as well as a couple other methods that I've seen suggested to no avail. I want to say Avast is the issue here. I was also logged in just fine today prior to the patch.
So my update gets stuck at 260 mb 73% and then wont update anymore.... its saying its not downloading any data so 0 kb's

Hey Klien Kurai,

It looks like you may need to configure Avast! to work with League by adding League to your firewall's exceptions list. Our [Troubleshooting Connections Issues Knowledge base](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq2) can help walk you through allowing League through your firewall!

> [{quoted}](name=Digital Ram,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=cqRyNqld,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-01-21T21:34:56.698+0000)
>
> Hey Klien Kurai,
> 
> It looks like you may need to configure Avast! to work with League by adding League to your firewall's exceptions list. Our [Troubleshooting Connections Issues Knowledge base](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq2) can help walk you through allowing League through your firewall!

I have, and it wont work.

i just uninstalled and installed the game again and it still wont go, im looking to try the RADS - project - lol_client deleting thing but i dont want to screw anything up

edit*

did the deleting thing and it works now, i repairing it as a percaution because i dont know how it all works

Update:  This worked for me:

> [{quoted}](name=N8 DA GR8,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=UJ3pOg6F,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-01-21T21:14:28.697+0000)
>
> "I had the exact same problem. What worked for me was that I went into Riot Games --> League of Legends --> RADS --> Projects and deleted all folders except for lol_air_client and lol_air_client_config_xxxx (depends on what server you are on). After I deleted them I started the game again and I saw the logo loading. I had to wait for like 20-30 sec until the game started up fully patched and I could log in. I hope this works for you too."
> 
> This worked for me.


Same issue with me.  I also tried the excluded path, reboot, and disabling avast completely and it still does not work.  I was able to log in this morning successfully, it patched and I logged in but since logging out I cannot get back in.  When I double click on the program (lol.launcher.exe) the league of legends splash screen logo pops up for a second and then disappears the cursor spins for a few more seconds and then nothing.  There does not appear to be anything left running in the task manager.  The same thing happens with lol.launcher.admin.exe, it does not matter if I am running as admin or not in Windows 8.1
this worked for me also. it ran a small patch but seems to be ok now

> [{quoted}](name=Gemmel,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=cqRyNqld,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-01-21T21:13:57.594+0000)
>
> Same issue with me.  I also tried the excluded path, reboot, and disabling avast completely and it still does not work.  I was able to log in this morning successfully, it patched and I logged in but since logging out I cannot get back in.  When I double click on the program (lol.launcher.exe) the league of legends splash screen logo pops up for a second and then disappears the cursor spins for a few more seconds and then nothing.  There does not appear to be anything left running in the task manager.  The same thing happens with lol.launcher.admin.exe, it does not matter if I am running as admin or not in Windows 8.1

Same, even the Pbe client wont work. 

im not sure if they use different things or even count as different programs but yea that doesnt work either
great job with new season start lol
i tried making the it an excluded file path with the riotGames folder but it still wont work
I have this issue as well, tried various settings but I can't get Launcher to open now. :(
